ai.reasonQwen32bText: Best balance between quality and speed for content generation
ai.reasonLlama70bText: Highest quality, but significantly slower and more resource-intensive
ai.reasonQwen7bText: Fast and resource-efficient, good for simple texts
ai.reasonQwen32bAnalysis: Good structured JSON output for analysis tasks
ai.reasonLlava13b: Best image understanding for vision tasks
ai.reasonLlava7b: Faster alternative with good image understanding

settings.brandVoiceHint: The more precise, the better the AI-generated content matches your brand.

models.assignmentsDesc: Assign different models to different tasks
models.claudeApiDesc: You are currently using the Claude API. Model management is only available for local Ollama models.
models.switchToOllama: Switch to Ollama in settings to manage local models.
models.installedModelsDesc: Models available on the Ollama server
models.noModels: No models found. Download a model.
models.downloadModelDesc: Download a new model from the Ollama library
models.modelAssigned: This model is assigned to a task. Switch to a different model first.
models.pageDescription: Manage your local Ollama models. Download new models or remove unused ones.
models.desc_qwen25_7b: Fast and efficient, great for quick content drafts and hashtag generation. Excellent multilingual support.
models.desc_qwen25_14b: Good balance of speed and quality. Strong structured JSON output for analysis tasks.
models.desc_qwen25_32b: Best Qwen model for social media content. Excellent quality with strong brand voice adherence.
models.desc_llama31_8b: Meta's latest compact model. Fast and good for English content generation.
models.desc_llama31_70b: Premium quality, significantly slower. Best for complex analysis and nuanced creative writing.
models.desc_mistral_7b: Very efficient model from Mistral AI. Good for European languages and quick generation.
models.desc_gemma2_9b: Google's compact model. Good instruction following and structured content generation.
models.desc_gemma2_27b: High-quality Google model. Reliable for professional content and brand consistency.
models.desc_deepseek_r1_14b: Reasoning-focused model with chain-of-thought. Best for data analysis and strategic decisions.
models.desc_llava_7b: Vision model: Understands images and generates descriptions. Good for alt text and image analysis.
models.desc_llava_13b: Better image understanding. More accurate and detailed visual descriptions.
models.desc_bakllava: Enhanced vision model with good OCR capabilities. Fast image analysis.
models.desc_llava_llama3_8b: Modern vision model using Llama3 architecture. Good quality multimodal understanding.
models.desc_nomic_embed: Embedding model for RAG systems. Generates text vectors for semantic search.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: This application ("Social Scheduler") is operated as a personal tool for managing and scheduling social media posts.
privacy.section2Intro: We collect and process the following data:
privacy.section2Item1: Account data: Email address and name upon registration
privacy.section2Item2: Social media tokens: OAuth access tokens for connected Facebook and LinkedIn accounts
privacy.section2Item3: Post content: Social media posts created and scheduled by you
privacy.section2Item4: Analytics data: Engagement metrics of your published posts
privacy.section3Intro: The collected data is used exclusively for:
privacy.section3Item2: Scheduling and publishing social media posts
privacy.section3Item3: AI-powered analysis of optimal posting times
privacy.section4Text: Your data is only shared with the platforms you have connected (Facebook, LinkedIn) in order to publish posts on your behalf. No data is shared with any other third parties.
privacy.section5Text: All data is stored in a PostgreSQL database. Access tokens are stored in encrypted form. You can request deletion of your account and all associated data at any time.
privacy.section6Item4: Revocation of social media platform connections
privacy.section7Text: This application uses only technically necessary cookies for session management and authentication. No tracking or advertising cookies are used.
privacy.section8Text: For questions regarding data privacy, please contact the operator of this application.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Text: These terms of service apply to the use of the application "Social Scheduler", a tool for planning and automatically publishing social media posts.
terms.section2Intro: Social Scheduler offers the following features:
terms.section2Item1: Creating and scheduling social media posts
terms.section2Item2: Automatic publishing on Facebook and LinkedIn
terms.section2Item3: AI-powered analysis of optimal posting times
terms.section3Text: A user account is required to use the service. You are responsible for the security of your login credentials. Each user may only have one account.
terms.section4Text: By connecting your social media accounts, you grant Social Scheduler permission to publish posts on your behalf. You can disconnect this connection at any time in the settings.
terms.section5Text: You are solely responsible for all content published through Social Scheduler. The content must comply with the terms of service of the respective platforms (Facebook, LinkedIn).
terms.section6Text: Social Scheduler is provided "as is". We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability of the service or the successful publication of scheduled posts.
terms.section7Text: You can delete your account at any time. Upon deletion, all your data, including scheduled posts and connected accounts, will be permanently deleted.
terms.section8Text: We reserve the right to modify these terms of service at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes.
